title: The Reunification of Korea?
text:
By Cifer Therrien
Thursday, January 25, 2018 7:49
% of readers think this story is Fact. Add your two cents.
 
 
A few weeks back I talked about the peace talks that were trying to take place between North and South Korea. As of Thursday, January 25th, a startling announcement has come from North Korea!! North Korea sent an announcement for all Koreans at home or abroad, saying that they should make a breakthrough for unification without the help of other countries!! The message wants to promote contact, travel, and cooperation between both North and South Korea. However, one statement was that Pyongyang will smash any challenges against the reunification. Could this be a hint at a bold move of the North, or merely a mistranslation the media is using to promote a war?!
